title: People cheat on this game
text: For one there are glitches in the game. I figured this out when me and a friend was playing together. When I broke the balls what happened on my table is not what happened on their table then it would flip to what was on his table. Next, you need to figure out a way to stop people from potting the cue ball at the end to avoid losing a game. I feel like there should be some kind of way that if you do such a thing you automatically lose. The ratio between win and loss between friends are never correct. This game needs fixed. I would love to be able to email and report a player. How can I do that? Do u have an email if so I have their user id

title: Needs improvement's
text: Nice game! But, needs a lot of improvement's. First, when I'm in a game. The app goes in a connecting to server mode then gets stuck. After the game freezes. It takes your tokens and you are left with fewer tokens. And, on to the next opponent.  Second, when I took a shot with the clock ticking. The game accepted my shot, then it took it back! And, went on with next player. Third. I purchased a cue stick. But, this cue stick needs recharging like after 6 games! Why? Should I have to recharge my cue all the time? Its 400 tokens every time I charge! Each game should be call your pocket! There are players who can't even play pool. And, just shoot as hard as they can to get any ball in! This app is just a money grabber!

title: In game purchase bugs
text: Lots of fun to play with one glaring exception: off you spend any real money in game you run the risk of never seeing what you paid for. I bought the pool pass deal because it's a fun little side quest to keep you interested with challenges and rewards. Problem being a lot of the paid rewards don't open so I never end up getting them. Any of the pro/elite boxes that I'm supposed to be getting as prizes shake like they usually do when you open them.... But then nothing happens and they're marked as 'collected' without antiquity giving you any. Really annoying to spend money on something and not get what you paid for... And then to have no answer from their support crew when you email them about it. Hoping they monitor their reviews and fix this. I saw another review mentioning purchasing coins and how they get ranked against people 2x their level constantly and do nothing but lose.... I've also had this problem.

title: Game cheats! It‚Äôs rigged!
text: Not only does this game cheat but it wouldn‚Äôt let me post this review. I tried for weeks to post it and it wouldn‚Äôt let me.   I decided to use a trial it offered at one point and because I didn‚Äôt buy whatever was offered after the trial was over I started losing every game.  I had almost 50,000 coins and now I have... you guessed it 0!! How does that happen? Really? I would watch the ball bounce out of the hole, the cue ball would pot at almost every turn, and when I thought I was about to win and would shoot for the 8 ball, the cue ball would pot and I would lose. I feel they do this on purpose to get you to buy the coins.  I will never purchase anything from any game ever. It was so aggravating watching my coins go from almost 50,000 to 0! I will be deleting this game. It‚Äôs almost a week later and I cannot get any of my coins back. I‚Äôm so done with this cheating game. You guys should be ashamed of yourself for trying to rip people off.

title: Fun to play - but don‚Äôt spend your money
text:
This game is extremely fun to play.   As you level up, more expensive matches/tournaments are available and you have to scroll through matches to select the one you choose.  If you touch the wrong one, you are entered into it whether you want to be there or not.  The coders were smart enough to not let you enter a tournament where you don‚Äôt have enough coins, but clever enough to not allow you to verify if you selected the correct match so you can erroneously be entered a match against players 20-30 levels higher than you.  That way, you lose all your coins and have to wait to purchase more.

I contacted Miniclip, and they said they don‚Äôt refund coins and to lock my screen.  Now how can you lock the screen and select a match at the same time?  If they don‚Äôt refund coins for a game error/glitch, you should never spend real money.

title: Garbage
text: I played this game a while ago when it frost came it. It WAS great. Spin, English, physics, etc‚Ä¶all seemed to work well. Now, the game is riddled with bot players that are either level 136 that can‚Äôt make a simple shot or level 35 players that run a difficult rack. Not to mention, all the times where I scratch on a shot that shouldn‚Äôt scratch or the bot players seem to get lucky 9 ball shots or the excessive amounts or ‚Äúluck‚Äù the bot players have. It seems this game is always trying to get me to buy stuff, which is why the bot players always seem to win when it‚Äôs convenient. I uninstalled this game and urge others to do the same until this game company decides what is more important.

title: Hacking
text: I think this game is great but there are a couple flaws. Playing the game and making it up through the ranks is difficult, but once you reach the point where you are capable of playing Berlin is useless. This is because Berlin is filled with hackers. If you have 40 million coins and play you take the risk of losing and losing automatically. It makes it hard to win in the personal and club leagues. USA #3-6 are all hackers with the same name and clearly have no experience of the game since they only have 400 games played. It is also easy to tell when you are playing one because they have a 98% win rate and when they don‚Äôt, they are on a win streak of 10+. Other than this it is one of my favorite games.

title: Don‚Äôt leave a review
text: All these stories are true. Bots , rigged shots , they hide ur cue ball on critical points in runs , and even if u make a Effen Rezzes shot u will scratch. I‚Äôve lost sleep over the stress of this game. Literally. I can‚Äôt hardly win at all anymore. Either put against a foreigner that don‚Äôt miss or it just seems nothing will roll your way. Idk I have managed to win about 7 rings but that‚Äôs over with. I can‚Äôt save up coins anymore. I had got up to 200k in coins over 2 months playing Vegas and Tokyo but I lost all that in one day from the deal we‚Äôre if ur not carful u click on the highest available match,it stuck me in Toronto . I came back and changed my rating cause I haven‚Äôt won a match since i put one star review üòûüò±

title: It‚Äôs great but....
text: I feel like the game is setup to continue to buy coins instead of arm them through wins. Th spoil pass is a great example of introducing more pay to play. The app always restarts you on a higher pool table instead of the one you were last on, which further speaks about trying to deplete your coins so you have to buy more. The tables past 10k put up all have the same rules. If I‚Äôm betting 50k, why would the table have the same rules as 10k or even 100k. Something isn‚Äôt right about that. Also, when I exit out of special games, like golden shot, it stays on the buy screen for 1.99. It‚Äôs very annoying that I can‚Äôt play the game without being subconsciously pushed to buying perks. Same after every game. Why do I have to continuous click off of purchase ads I clicked off in the beginning when I opened the app?

title: Rigged
text: So I‚Äôve been playing this for a few months and honestly I‚Äôve never had a game this toxic and fake. It‚Äôs funny to me that when my opponent does some stuff that should be an automatic lose but wins anyway but when I do it my opponents still win. I‚Äôve been reading about it and I know I‚Äôm not the only one that knows this game has tons of cheaters. One day when I had lots of coins, I played maybe about 5 matches... lost every single one for some bs reason. Multiple made the 8 ball in and didn‚Äôt lose (the 8 ball would literally be put back on the table) I lost over 100k in under 20 min.... Also you can tell when they cheat when they are on a level lower than you but they have millions of coins.... it‚Äôs literally impossible to gain that much that quick. Overall don‚Äôt get this game unless you want some toxic stuff and to lose all the time. Winning is rare(unless you want to cheat)

title: SOUNDS OF WAR
text:
I‚Äôm a 75-year-old war vet wearing a turtleneck and whenever I‚Äôm not playing this game all I can hear is the sound of gunshots and of my fellow brothers dying.  
We lost so many in one day one time that on my eyebrows fell out and I was left to separate dirt from mud as I waited on helicopter support. Years later I still hadn‚Äôt left Vietnam and I found myself married with three kids to a woman who didn‚Äôt even speak the same language as me. It was hell. I didn‚Äôt say a word until 2005. A single word I speak until I found this game. If the Internet wherever to go down I would have to resume a militaristic reaction to my every day life. I pray to God that this five star rating will keep my blessed with Wi-Fi as I hide under the sewers of my fair city.

title: Set up for you to spend real money! It‚Äôs a scam!
text: I‚Äôve been playing this game for a while now and now that I‚Äôm playing in Las Vegas and Jakarta you‚Äôd expect to make good money on the spins right? Wrong I‚Äôm lucky to get 500 coins off the spin when in one day I can spend over $400k coins on games but never get nothing in return. Why do they do this? Simple they want you to spend $5 or $10 sometimes more on the specials they run that‚Äôll give you more coins and more cash. It‚Äôs so rigged it‚Äôs disgusting. I haven‚Äôt spent a single dime on this game but lately since I‚Äôve been playing in Toronto and some other high end games I run out of money quickly. It took me months to save up $500k coins and for it to be all gone in a matter of hours is just annoying beyond belief. Another 5 months grinding to get my coins back? Yeah I don‚Äôt think so. I have enough for one more Toronto and if I don‚Äôt win then I‚Äôm deleting the game and never playing again. Miniclip is a joke!!!!

title: WHY??
text: I just have a few questions regarding this game!! Why is it that the coin spin wheel is so low on the pay out? I mean this game would be so much more entertaining if the pay outs where 10x higher than what it is set at now! Even your free 50 plus coins they give you daily is just so low! Coins should be blessed in this game! We could do so much more and open more rooms!! There are tons of poker games out there that reward millions of coins on pay outs! So with all that said! I‚Äôd most definitely rate this game a 5 star rating all day! But that‚Äôs my only dilemma here. And yes Mr. Developer I understand your game revolves around making money! That‚Äôs clearly the case here! But I‚Äôm quite certain that a million more people would download this game if coins had a better pay out value! I mean at the end of the day isn‚Äôt it about the ratings! Thanks

title: Things have gone bad with this game
text:
I‚Äôve been playing this game for ~5 years; when I started the the outcome of the games, it seems, was as they should be i.e. whoever played the best won.  Now, this game CHEATS like you can‚Äôt believe.  There are a lot of ‚Äúodd‚Äù scratches after sinking the 8 ball, scratches that you watch and know that it shouldn‚Äôt have happened.  I say all of this after having spoken with a few other players of this game and each of them agreed or offered without prompting that it‚Äôs not the same as it used to be and we hate playing now because the outcome seems predetermined.

There are in app purchases available and I‚Äôm guessing if you buy $100 of junk per week you‚Äôll win every game, if you don‚Äôt you‚Äôll just keep losing to those who do.  I know I sound like a poor sport who‚Äôs on a losing streak but I‚Äôm not, I‚Äôm just someone who used to love this game and now hate it like poison.

title: Joke!
text: This game is a total ripe-off. Too bad we can‚Äôt give it a less than a 1. This needs a negative 50. Junk. Don‚Äôt waste your time or energy downloading it. I‚Äôve played pool for years and I‚Äôve never seen a ball stop exactly half way in the edge of a pocket the way this game does. It either going in or not. Almost impossible for a ball to stop half way especially so many times. Lost too many games that way. I had a 58.2 % average when I deleted the app so I‚Äôm not a crappy player. Probably should have been more like 65-68% minimum. Also if you want to download and play anyway don‚Äôt do like I did any actually try to play pool just hit it as hard as you can and you‚Äôll have a better chance of winning. Good luck!

title: Love the game
text: I really love the game I play this game for almost 2 year and I never like to spend money on this game because I choose not to, I just like to play for fun and win some coin to keep on playing, but there is a chance that I might play against some really pro player in the world that going to beat me really bad, but never give up because you was trying your best to win against them, but if you beat them you will feel so happy because you just manage to beat someone who is way higher level then you and got more skilled then you, now just keep on winning more and more so you can get better, one day you will be a pro player one day

title: Please don‚Äôt waste your time.
text: This is by far the most rigged and money hungry game you‚Äôll ever play. You‚Äôd swear to god this game was made by the IRS and EA by how blatantly obvious it is that you need to spend money on it to do anything. They want you to wait 12 real life hours to gain 600 coins and 4 pool prices that are completely irrelevant because the only pool sticks that do anything are the paid ones. Of corse you do have the option to buy out the wait time, that cost actual money tho. The mini games they offer are completely bogus, I had 34 free spins, not a single one of them landed on 1000 coins or more. When you play online you can tell when you‚Äôre playing bots because the bots shots will always be open. They also added a ‚Äúbattle pass‚Äù type of concept because ya know.. what is originality. Take 75¬¢ and go play real pool at your local bowling alley.

title: Problems
text: I notice when your winning the game there is a glitch that allows your opponent to stop the game and while your waiting for your opponent to come back your time is up! When clearly you had enough time left. Basically, your opponent doesn‚Äôt like to get beaten and we all loose in this game but that‚Äôs cheating. I can take a loss, I have no problem with that because there are good players in this game, but all that does for kids who play this game is to learn how to cheat and not play a honest game? Is this what this game is about to play a game that you can cheat on! That‚Äôs why I gave you guys a 4 star. I try to teach kids win or loose in a video game that if you loose do better on the next game! You don‚Äôt have to cheat to win! What is this coming too? Wow! Cheat to win! Unbelievable!

title: Going over issues.
text:
Hello. So I started playing pool not to long ago, and I‚Äôve won matches etc. But with my experience with loss of coins and ‚Äúpoor connection‚Äù is crazy.. I won a scratcher and I got the 500K coins!! But it didn‚Äôt say I did it gave me 4k+4K+4K coins. Please fix this. I WANT MY COINS! I got them fairly and I hope you understand this miscommunication with the game, but I hope you can help me rightly get the coins that I deserve.. 
With the ‚Äúpoor connection‚Äù issue it says I have poor WiFi. But I don‚Äôt, like when you‚Äôre playing a match and it‚Äôs you‚Äôre turn and it‚Äôs poor WiFi it misses you‚Äôre turn and then the other person gets those coins! I‚Äôve lost over 20K on that FIX IT! Thank you for you‚Äôre time and I hope I can here back from you! It would be very appreciated if you would so we can get this fixed and I can get those coins back :)

title: Great game but plagued by glitches
text: Let me start by saying I‚Äôm 100% confident it‚Äôs not a connection issue on my end. I have gigabit fiber coming into the house and a gigabit WiFi router with several extenders. No other connection issues in my house, but this game says ‚Äúslow connection, pleas wait‚Äù 85% of the time I play it. I in know it‚Äôs just a game, but it‚Äôs infuriating. Because of the glitches you end up getting a fraction of the time normally allowed to line up a shot, or you sink a few balls then it glitches and didn‚Äôt log your last two shots, or you end up sinking the 8 ball and then it doesn‚Äôt register and you loose lol. Upgrade your hosting service or something, please.

title: Time shot
text: If your going to give a warning about switching cues ‚Äúduring‚Äù a shot in the middle of a game you should stop the clock! Give that warning during a tutorial not after someone is 100+ games in to the game in the middle of a match! I‚Äôve switched cues multiple times during matches and all of a sudden during an important shot in a match... while the clock is running... you want to pop up a message on the screen saying ‚Äúwarning.. if you want to surprise...‚Äù!?! Obviously I‚Äôm not going to read the whole message because the ‚Äúclock is running!‚Äù. This game is pay to win. If you don‚Äôt spend money they‚Äôll find a way for you to lose. Spend money and the chances of winning tip heavily in your favor. From the amount of time to shoot with expensive cues.. to the white ball rolling just a bit further for you to win. Don‚Äôt spend and they‚Äôll make it very frustrating for you.

title: Awesome game but the animations are annoying
text: I love the gameplay. Best pool game ever. I‚Äôve been for about 6 years. However, I haves major problem with something outside of gameplay.  Please remove these animations from victory boxes and prizes. If I open a box I have to click through every single item and then again to close it out. Just one button is enough. Also with pool pass I have to click everything twice to claim the prize. It‚Äôs extremely annoying and unnecessary. Just today I spent over 5 minutes claiming prizes because of all this extra clicking. This isn‚Äôt a kids game. We don‚Äôt need that. Further, I would like all available prize boxes to open with one click rather than one at a time. Once they‚Äôre unlocked just one click opens them all. Again love the game but the extra animations have to go.

title: Works good, just do not try to update your profile
text:
The game itself deserves 5-stars. My 1-star rating is based on their technical support, or lack of....

I made the mistake of logging onto the Miniclip website to update my information. After that, I could no longer login with my Facebook ID. I contacted support and they told me that they detected unusual activity and my account was flagged and threatened to permanently ban me. When I questioned and explained that I was only updating my profile information, their response was ‚ÄúWe have no further information regarding this situation as everything relevant was already added in our previous message.‚Äù Translation: we don‚Äôt care, not our problem, etc. I already deleted the app from ALL of my devices and removed the info from my Facebook account. As soon as they tell me how to delete my account, I am doing it!

It is a good game, and highly entertaining. Just plan to NEVER change your password.

title: Luck, purchases, then skill
text: The basic interactions and mechanics of this game can be quite enjoyable. But it‚Äôs pretty much luck to win or loose. After playing this very long you get the feeling that in order to ‚Äúimprove‚Äù you need more techniques and cue powers that only come from $$. Not that I wanted to win all my games but I definitely felt like there were times when I could predict that I was going to win or loose - it just didn‚Äôt seem to depend too much whether I was playing well or not.  So even though there are no ads, I feel like I‚Äôm being forced to spend $$ to continue playing. The game was fun but not the pressure to win to keep playing.

title: Game is Broken
text:
I have played this game for a long time and recently within the past months i have lost so much money from WINNING. Yes that‚Äôs right, from WINNING. If i collect a completed daily challenge to after i have won a match i lose everything that i won from the previous match. So for example. I played a 100k prize (50k vs. 50k) match and won and then after I collected a challenge that I completed (pot 4 balls in a row) and once I collected the challenge reward, instantly 50k was deducted from my coins and i no longer had it in my bank anymore. It has happened so many times now and its pathetic. Ive lost 100‚Äôs of thousands of coins and they are still nowhere to be seen. The only was ive been able to pass by this glitch is to close my app after every win and reopen it to collect the daily challenge prize. Please fix this game. I love playing it all day, especially in quarantine! 

Thank you

title: Hey Miniclip!! Good criticism from an true expert player (60%+)
text:
Crashes, unusable for me.I used to like this game despite the obvious scratch algorithms. 

Update: Since I upgraded my ipod air to latest IOS, your game is almost unusable, crashes all the time when I scroll right or left to access other 8 ball screens. Hey geniuses, did you know apple uses right or left swipes for other functions? SMH

PREVIOUS:

Great game, but I wish the game played more like real. Your version of english does not follow physics. If you are a free loader like me (never spends a dime) AND you are good (above 60%) you program the algorithm to make you scratch. So not only do you have to play against the opponent, you have to play against miniclip. If there was a better game, I‚Äôd buy it. 

Also I would pay for an option that lets me watch the other matches while waiting for mine. I would get to see how the opponent plays and possibly change my strategy.

Wouldn‚Äôt it would be nice to hit a button and the game sends the last shot to facebook or save it some other way? You would get a lot more people posting on social media.

I would pay for a premium version with good features. I can beat anyone with your basic stick, so your fancy sticks really don‚Äôt float my boat.

title: üò°

I‚Äôve played pool for 40 years and have never seen anything like some of the stuff I‚Äôve seen happen to me on this game! title: Fun but takes your money
text:
This game is very fun, however there are two related issues that cause problems and frustration... it always ‚Äúsuggests‚Äù a level that will cause you to bet (and potentially lose) max coins.... meaning you are always one errant click away from betting everything you‚Äôve earned or paid for. 

That would be fine if it wasn‚Äôt so easy to accidentally join a game, and if you accidentally click on a level your stuck in that game. I‚Äôve accidentally bet 100K Coins because of a game that took place in my pocket, and 50K because of accidentally joining a game while scrolling between levels and then of course losing. 

I have lost massive amounts of coins (that I paid for) due to this. When I emailed for support I got no response.  I won‚Äôt pay another dime because I‚Äôm convinced this is intentional so you spend more money. Otherwise it‚Äôs a very fun and realistic pool game.

title: Best pool app there is
text:
Works great. I think the shots are fairly accurate for being digital pool. I wish the tournaments would always put you with people in your same level or closer to it anyway but if people aren't playing that are your level, I suppose you'd be waiting quite a while. 

The biggest complaint I have is the cost of cues and the little amount of pool cash you get when leveling up. It would take years to earn the cues without spending actual dollars which I have done but that is beside the point. I'd be more apt to spend real money if it were easier to earn money. Can ask my other app developers...

title: Pool Most Excellent
text: This is the one people! Super easy and super fun...with the kind of satisfying wins and crushing defeats that will keep you playing for hours. Use the default guidelines to easily line up shots. Once you get the hang of it you can turn the guidelines off to increase the pool simulation. Compete against players from all over the world. Play in single game 8 ball and 9 ball ‚Äúvs.‚Äù modes or try your luck in competitive multiplayer tournaments. Choose freely between different tables for different stakes. Don‚Äôt forget to upgrade your cue! There are many great cues to be had for a few $$$, but no worries because it‚Äôs easy to upgrade to some really great cues by simply opening prizes. You‚Äôll be sharking in no time. Time to get playing.

title: Fix please
text: Every time i try to open the app it shows the 8 ball screen but app closes back out and doesn‚Äôt work unless i uninstall and reinstall everything else works great and i love the game but this is starting to irritate me .. and please update the prize wheel because everyone notices it never gives you anything over 500 and I‚Äôve been playing this for 2 years i really think it‚Äôs time to update the whole games with more features and live tournament and a option to sell pool stick that we own and sticks should be upgraded accordingly to how much we use them or how much we win games with them other than that this games gets a 5 star rating without hesitation is the #1 pool game..

title: Game Head

title: Fun game but some unfair matches with opponents
text:
The game usually will match you against someone within 4 levels against your level. However during regular games it has matched me against opponent up to 8 levels higher. I think it‚Äôs unfair to players. In Tournaments that‚Äôs a different story but this is regular matches. 

The game seems to freeze at times too. The game suddenly removed my Facebook profile photo and I was forced to pick one from the game. No option to change it back. 

Also, there needs to be an option within the app to let the players notify Administrators there is a problem. There is currently no option except here to let anyone know anything might be an issue.

title: One of my Favorite games, UNTIL‚Ä¶..
text: Until recently I played this game multiple times daily for several years, then a few days ago it would not load, I have tried repeatedly but no luck. I have tried several different things but it will only get to the Home Screen then when I try to click on anything it kicks me out, sometimes it won‚Äôt even let me get to that point before it kicks me out. Thus the reason for the 2 star rating, if I could play again I would give the app 10 stars but if I can‚Äôt play it I can‚Äôt rate it any higher. Would love to play again if someone could tell me how to get the game to load again.

title: My experiences
text:
This is a wonderful app.

I‚Äôve been playing for almost a month, and currently, I‚Äôm a level 26 in the platinum league. It‚Äôs an amazing game, and I‚Äôve spent a few dollars for the piggy bank. However, there‚Äôs been a few flaws I‚Äôve encountered.

I played a few games in Las Vegas, which is 20k, and noticed for 3 or 4 games, there were two 8 balls! One of them were odd, however, because the person I was playing against accidentally sunk one, yet it did nothing. I haven‚Äôt had this issue ever since but it definitely was really confusing.

Next, I would like to talk about how rigged the Spin-to-wins and the Scratchers are. You have an ability to win so much money on both, yet every time I do them, I win such little money. I‚Äôve also asked my friends and family that play this game, and they have the same report. They never win anything good, even if you spend real money on it.

Next issue, is that every day, I get numerous pop ups saying that my friends are online, or that they were online recently. It‚Äôll ask me if I want to challenge them, and when I press later, it still challenges them after I declined. 

Despite the flaws, it‚Äôs still a good game.

title: Ridiculous Game with so many cheaters
text:
I‚Äôve being playing this game for more almost a decade now and since 1 or 2 years ago there are so many cheaters now that you can‚Äôt play 3 consecutive games with a non cheater player, if disgusting, I used to have a lot of fun with a fair competition to win all the tournaments, even used to pay for Venice and also get Venice to some other friends so we all could be competitive, but now this is so disappointing because we have report all the accounts that‚Äôs are cheating and Mini clip never, never, NEVER do anything about it. That‚Äôs why no one is playing Venice anymore. I wish this could get fixed because I really love this game but honestly if there was another game that could match this one I‚Äôll just leave this and join the other one and spend money but always with a fair play. 

Miniclip you are letting the cheater ruin the game. 

DO SOMETHING ABOUT IT!

title: Too many cheaters!!!
text: I have played this game for about 10 years and I love it. The reality, concept and accuracy is great. There is always a tournament or challenge going on. But the past year this game has become a joke. Every 3rd match on high stake tables is a cheater,hacker, tool user or bot. I can't understand how Miniclip can not do something about this as they are the creator and controller of the game. The only determination I've been able to come up with is that Miniclip welcomes and accepts these cheaters so the honest players are forced to buy coins. They have created a way to easily report these cheating players but does it really work? I'd say no it doesn't. How can they explain an obvious cheater all the way up to level 300??? I'm becoming more and and more dissatisfied with Miniclips handling or lack there of this cheating mess that continues to ruin this great game.

title: Couple issues
text:
This isn‚Äôt my first complaint. While scrolling through the tables and games, I have accidentally hit play rather than trying to do a ‚Äòlook see‚Äù. Two million coins have been lost. When starting a new game, we should be asked if we are sure and not just starting and taking our hard earned coins. 

A second VERY irritating issue is ‚Äòjoe blow‚Äô challenged you when you were offline. Then being told that ‚ÄòJane doe‚Äô was recently online. I could care less who was when I wasn‚Äôt. Tell us ‚Äòwho is‚Äô not ‚Äòwho was‚Äô.  I can only play people who are online at same time, those who were. 

Fix these issues please and get five stars.

title: So addictive!
text: I originally downloaded this game because my friend had a long car ride ahead of her, and she wanted to play a game with a friend.  Immediately, we were both hooked on the game.  It‚Äôs more than just any ordinary pool game, there are so many different things to do that you will absolutely NEVER get bored! You play against real players to earn money, and you can spend that money on cues or you can use that money to buy bigger games that give you a chance to earn more money, etc, etc.  I really hope you give this game a chance.  I have been playing it for over a year now and I find new things every day without in app purchases. Thank you for reading this and have a good day.

title: Loss of over 200,000 points
text: I have enjoyed playing this game for several years and had accumulated 345,000 points.  The most I have ever bet was 1,000 points as I never felt like I knew how to play that well.  The other day I was trying to go onto the game and it would open and then cut off.  It would not let me get into the game itself so I just closed it out and did not try again until the next day.  When it opened up and I did my free spin and won 150 points and that is when I saw that I only had Ike 104,000 points.  I HAVE NO IDEA WHAT HAPPENED BECAUSE IT WOULD NOT LET ME GET IN TO EVEN PAY A GAME SO I HAVE NO IDEA HOW I COULD HAVE LOST THE POINTS.  I really do not want to quit playing this game, but this was not my fault and I want my points back.

title: Frustrated
text: I enjoy playing the game. But it‚Äôs extremely unfair how you can get matched to play someone with twice the level as you. I‚Äôm currently a level 46 and keep getting matched with people twice my level. That‚Äôs a ton more experience!! And I don‚Äôt know how they decide who breaks, but I‚Äôve now gone over 10 games in a row. And half of those games, I didn‚Äôt get one shot. That‚Äôs probably because I‚Äôm getting matched with people twice my level. Yes...I‚Äôm writing this review out of frustration. And that‚Äôs because the game is becoming not so fun for me. Nobody likes to lose. Especially when your set up to fail and not given an opportunity to try to win. I‚Äôm probably just going to delete the app and find a new pool game to try. UPDATE:still the same issues. Especially after spending money on lucky shot to have the money to play bigger tables. They have a bot problem on here.

title: Broken game
text: Your game is broken, there are so much hackers and you guys don‚Äôt do anything about it. Anyone can hack in this game easily, also I potted all my balls only had the 8 ball left and made the shot. Right when I made it the game said connection is slow and my opponent somehow made in the 8 ball and I lost when I was supposed to win, since I already potted the 8 ball. And it was was my turn not hers. But since your game is so broken I‚Äôm already used to this type of stuff in this game, and I cannot do anything other then telling you. Also you guys have the worst matchmaking you put me in matches with people 100+ levels more than me even players in level 300 when I‚Äôm on level 17 which is very unfair because they have way more experience than me, and I don‚Äôt stand a chance against them. Why can‚Äôt you guys fix this problems and make the game more fun, and fair please.

title: Mr.T
text: I'm like the majority of the reviews I've seen and I also believe that there is something suspicious about this app that's a fact. I am seriously thinking about uninstalling the game üôÅlet me also add another complaint regarding the matches,,,they don‚Äôt match you with a close level,you know like in boxing uhh...you get were I‚Äôm coming from.üëéüëéüëé I‚Äôm pretty sure that‚Äôs done on purpose! Now I‚Äôm convinced someone is messing around with the game cause now when you get to a certain level or coin amount ( in the upper million coin balance) they shorten your guide line right before you take your shot now that is totally wrong and whoever is in charge of this app should be ashamed, I‚Äôm stunned at how rigged this app is wow incredible!

title: I Still Love 8 Ball Pool!!!
text: This is an amazing game! I love the different options there are to play and achievements to be had. I look forward to the many events that take place throughout the different seasons and cues that only occur for short periods of time. My favorite part of 8 Ball Pool is collecting cues. I get so excited when I see a new one or read about things to come, on the 8 Ball Pool Facebook page or the many different forums and platforms where fans come together to discuss play and achievements. There is still a big issue with cheating, it's terrible, but I've noticed the developers are cracking down on this in a big way! Overall it's a great game and it is getting more awesome as time passes! Thank you!

title: Suggestions
text:
Overall, this is a great game. Definitely the best pool game on the App Store. I play pool a lot in real life, though, and the side spin on this game doesn‚Äôt reflect exactly what happens on a real life table. If at all possible, I would like to see the side spin updated so that it works more like a real life table. Also, I would like to see the push-out option in 9-ball because that is how the game should be played, and it‚Äôs pretty unlucky if my opponent breaks dry but the cue ball is left in a position that is an impossible kick to hit the 1-Ball. My last suggestion is the three-foul-rule in 9-ball. Another thing that gets on my nerves is when a player keeps purposely fouling because I can do nothing with ball-in-hand. In 9-ball rules there is a three-foul-rule protecting that strategy. 

Thank you

title: Good game, great for free!
text: Good game, I'm addicted. The in app purchases are for cash to buy premium pool cues, more tokens, and for more chat phrases.  Need tokens to play, but you can get tokens for free either via a daily spin or by watching ads.  You get cash by leveling up or by doing Tapjoy style ads--downloading other apps, signing up for stuff or visiting web sites.  Another way to get tokens is by winning matches or tournaments, so as long as you like pool and there's someone out there to play with game play can be endless!  It gets more challenging as you go since as you level up you get matched up against opponents that are similar level.  I've played people from all over the world so that's fun too. Enjoy!

title: Total Joke
text:
I‚Äôve played for a couple years now and I guess I‚Äôve gotten to the point where I‚Äôve just gotta get cheated every time I play. I have never and obviously will never ever spend a dime on this joke and apparently that puts you in some kinda special category... and every time I log in to play I play someone who is using every single cheat they have. I have not played a real opponent for about a half a year now. So when I play now, it‚Äôs nothing like billiards. I have to out think their cheats. It‚Äôs hilarious what happens. Here is how things are now set up for me ... every single game ... 

on the break - I never pot a ball ... ever ... and half the time the cue ball scratches.

If I get a shot on my turn ... and if it is not completely blocked ... I will scratch no matter how or where I hit it. 

The quote, unquote opponent I play never scratches and is never blocked. 

They used to do their normal cheats ... like everyone goes thru when u don‚Äôt pay any money for ridiculous things ... like losing the connection right when ur about to win, but now I have achieved the highest honor anyone can be bestowed in mini clip 8ball pool ... the complete lock down cheat!!! I am quite honored!!

If there is anyone in the world that thinks this game is real and doesn‚Äôt cheat ... maybe Santa will bring the Easter bunny with him this year when he comes down your chimney

title: Lots of fun, but WAY too many bots at the higher levels.
text: I‚Äôd give this app 10 stars if I could, because it‚Äôs a lot of fun, and I‚Äôve been playing it for 2 years now, but there are WAY to many bots and cheaters at the higher levels. There is a way to report cheaters, but it doesn‚Äôt seem like 8 Ball is doing anything about it. My advice: download and enjoy the game, but don‚Äôt spend any money until they clean it up. Instead, start at the most basic levels and MASTER those, only moving on to more expensive tables when you‚Äôve built up enough coins/experience. Also, it‚Äôs a good rule of thumb to never bet more than 1% - 2% of your overall coin total per game, so you never get into too much trouble. That‚Äôs how I‚Äôve managed to build up 600 million coins over a year.
